mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FACILITY ( FAC_CODE, FAC_NO, FAC_NAME, FAC_GYU, FAC_HYUN, FAC_YONG, TECH_NO, FAC_MAN1, FAC_MAN2, FAC_LOT, FAC_E1, FAC_PLC, FAC_E2, FAC_MAKE, FAC_CBUY, FAC_E3, FAC_BUY, FAC_MDAY, FAC_MON, FAC_ABLE, FAC_TIME, FAC_TEST, FAC_E4, FAC_BIGO, FAC_GUBN, FAC_DAN, FAC_CAU, FAC_UNUS, FAC_FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(FAC_CODE), 0)+1 FROM FACILITY ), #{fac_no}, #{fac_name}, #{fac_gyu}, #{fac_hyun}, #{fac_yong}, #{tech_no}, #{fac_man1}, #{fac_man2}, #{fac_lot}, #{fac_e1}, #{fac_plc}, #{fac_e2}, #{fac_make}, #{fac_cbuy}, #{fac_e3}, #{fac_buy}, #{fac_mday}, #{fac_mon}, #{fac_able}, #{fac_time}, #{fac_test}, #{fac_e4}, #{fac_bigo}, '1', #{fac_dan}, #{fac_cau}, #{fac_unus}, #{fac_file_name} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FACILITY SET FAC_NO = #{fac_no}, FAC_NAME = #{fac_name}, FAC_GYU = #{fac_gyu}, FAC_HYUN = #{fac_hyun}, FAC_YONG = #{fac_yong}, TECH_NO = #{tech_no}, FAC_MAN1 = #{fac_man1}, FAC_MAN2 = #{fac_man2}, FAC_LOT = #{fac_lot}, FAC_E1 = #{fac_e1}, FAC_PLC = #{fac_plc}, FAC_E2 = #{fac_e2}, FAC_MAKE = #{fac_make}, FAC_CBUY = #{fac_cbuy}, FAC_E3 = #{fac_e3}, FAC_BUY = #{fac_buy}, FAC_MDAY = #{fac_mday}, FAC_MON = #{fac_mon}, FAC_ABLE = #{fac_able}, FAC_TIME = #{fac_time}, FAC_TEST = #{fac_test}, FAC_E4 = #{fac_e4}, FAC_BIGO = #{fac_bigo}, FAC_DAN = #{fac_dan}, FAC_CAU = #{fac_cau}, FAC_UNUS = #{fac_unus}, FAC_FILE_NAME = #{fac_file_name} WHERE FAC_CODE = #{fac_code}
